notable_findings: SA2-M45-F001: Acceleration clause lacks explicit decision procedure
SA2-M46-F001: Criteria weights in TRADEOFF-0001 lack justification
SA2-M76-F001: Success metrics lack confidence intervals
SA3-M37-F001: Incomplete causal chain in feedback loop
SA3-M55-F002: Graduated enforcement incentivizes strategic delay
SA3-M80-F001: Optimism bias in enforcement timeline
SA1-M1-F002: Transitive closure completeness is undecidable
SA1-M79-F002: Content-hash fetch restriction bypass via dependency traversal

north_star_assessment.score_delta_rationale: SA-3 (Systems Analyst) applied stricter scoring, reducing P2-P4 scores based on limited extensibility for third-party artifact kinds, enterprise customization, and federation protocols. SA-1 and SA-2 scores remained similar to prior review.
strategic_recommendations: PRD-0007 is strongly aligned with P1 (Recursive Improvement) via canonical context substrate, deterministic execution, and closed-loop feedback
P2 alignment is moderate - artifact_kinds registry is closed-world, limiting third-party innovation. Recommend CAC v2 extensibility scope.
P3 alignment is moderate - target profiles enable vendor integration but lack enterprise-specific customization pathways
P4 and P5 alignment are weak by design - CAC v1 is foundational infrastructure focused on P1; P4/P5 features require follow-on PRDs
RECOMMENDATION: Add explicit out_of_scope items for P2/P3/P4 extensibility deferred to CAC v2 to set expectations

verdict_reason: Council identified 6 BLOCKER findings requiring remediation. All 6 have proposed remediations with quorum support (5 unanimous, 1 majority). PRD requires application of proposed remediations before PASSED verdict.

remediation_action_items.action: Apply bootstrap recovery deadlock remediation to 06_constraints_invariants.yaml
Apply ceremony race condition remediation to 06_constraints_invariants.yaml
Apply hash collision remediation to 06_constraints_invariants.yaml and 04_solution_overview.yaml
